Package com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy.wordtoimage.textpaster

implementations of AbstractTextPaster

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractTextPaster Base class for Font generators.
BaffleRandomTextPaster text paster that paint white holes on the string (erase some parts) You may specify the number of holes per glyph : 3 by default.
DoubleRandomTextPaster Randomly pastes two times the attributed string with a random(5) decalage
DoubleTextPaster Pastes two times the attributed string with a random decalage from width/20 and height/2
RandomTextPaster Paste the text randomly on the background
SimpleTextPaster Pastes the text at width/20 and height/2
